name: Into the rabbit hole
description:
PITCH

Play as Alice in Wonderlands and enter the wonderfully weird world of the Rabbit Hole ! Fall all the way down the Hole, avoid the mess and meet some friends. But be careful you will find yourself in very odd situations, maybe there is a meaning behind all this ? Or maybe not ? Just take the leap forward and fall into the Rabbit Hole

CREDITS

 Game Artists : Mallaurie Le Bihan 

 Lylian Louat - Lucien Delmas - Jason Hameon - Paul Gaffney - Alexandre Roblin - Charles Bouyssou - Manasseh Rakotoasimbola - Martin Arribard - Yoan Agostini - Audrey Ferrandez - Étienne Niemiec - 

Game Designers : Aurélien Fontaine - Clément Tisserand

Game Programmers : Camille Lavarde - Yannis de Macedo - Matilde Rodrigues

Producing : Charlotte Litto
